flawed_nl_solution:
Ellen takes 4*3=<<4*3=21>>21 hours in total to rise all balls of dough.
It will take 4*2=<<4*2=8>>8 more hours to bake each one.
It will take her 21+8=<<21+8=29>>29 hours to make all of the bread.
#### 29

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 12, not 21. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
